full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GNAS MCHOG RI BO RTZE LNGA'I RTEN GYI GTZO BO 'JAM DBYANGS SENG BZHON LA BSTOD PA BYIN RLABS YONGS 'DUS SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL MTSAN LDAN GLING GI LHA KHANG GI RTEN GYI GTZO BO 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO SENG BZHON LA BSTOD PA BYIN RLABS YONGS 'DUS SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD BRTZON BLO GROS DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS BZANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, MKHAN MING BA'I SKYE BAR SKRO BTAGS PA'I RMONGS RTUL SKAL BZANG MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSOS SPRUL PA'I GNAS MCHOG RI BO RTZE LNGA'I NUB PHYOGS KUN 'DUS GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN BLO GSAL RGYA MTSO'O,, ,,)
